title: Log in Problem
body:
Why i cant log in?????
I hate this login Status and waiting to log in.
Pls help me Riot

replies.body: There's currently a known issue with delayed logins on the EUNE server.  Based on recent information, it should be starting to clear up (Can track updates on our [Server Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune) page), but if you still aren't able to log in, let me know and we'll take another look at what may be happening.
Same problem with me riot Plsss fix it
riot pls solve the prob fast
I have the same problem...I hope it will be fixed soon.
